channel.title: []idea to clean up the tutorial forums[]
channel.description:
There are too many tutorials that just have item spawning commands and npc autospawns. I think there should be two stickied topics, one for people to paste their item commands and another 1 for people to paste their npc autospawns. This would mean that the forums wouldn't be crowded with commands that anybody could make, but will show the tutorials that were difficult to make.
Anybody with me?????????

item.title: []idea to clean up the tutorial forums[]
item.dc:creator: @ThatOneServer Mike_
item.description:
@ThatOneServer wrote:

how about this. you make it so everyone has to do the page again, and it says “if you dont read the stickies on each page, you will be banned” on the top. then if ppl post about it not in the sticky, you can delete the post and warn them.

Read full topic
item.source: []idea to clean up the tutorial forums[]

item.title: []idea to clean up the tutorial forums[]
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

That ‘compilation’ of tutorials is called the “Tutorial Section”. And, if you asked anyone to read that shit once, good luck getting them to do it.

The thing is, how do you get someone to follow the rules if they don’t read what they are? I’m pretty sure mopar could get someone to hook him up with a script that says “READ THE FUCKING STICKIES” upon each page load, but you know… Probably won’t help still.

Read full topic
item.source: []idea to clean up the tutorial forums[]

item.title: []idea to clean up the tutorial forums[]
item.dc:creator: @the_one1 the one
item.description:
@the_one1 wrote:

Why don’t we do it this way?
We have a compilation of tutorials, someone must be free enough to do that rolls eyes and make it mandatory for every one to read it at least once.

item.title: []idea to clean up the tutorial forums[]
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

- Really? Wow, that’s confusing :S. Oh, well since that’s the case, I change my opinion.

Keeping messy and repeated tutorials would be a good thing for new members. All they do is have to click on the tutorials page and…voila! There is 10 tutorials on what error you are getting or ‘How to spawn NPCs’ and such. That way, they click and they get the problem solved…like that.

Read full topic
item.source: []idea to clean up the tutorial forums[]

item.title: []idea to clean up the tutorial forums[]
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

(We use the same site discussions forum for both sites chris ;))

But I doubt people would do that anyway, plus it would be hard to search through the post for whatever “code” you wanted, I dont see anything wrong with it the way it is now.

Read full topic
